mapper.insert: insert into store_sku_stock (product_id, store_id, sku_id, sku_price, sku_stock, created_time, update_time) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{skuStock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
